FDA/CDER/OND/ODEIV/DPMH 22 
Risk Summary 
There are no adequate and well-controlled studies of [TRADENAME] in 
pregnant women.  The limited available information on [TRADENAME] 
use during pregnancy is not sufficient to inform a drug-associated risk of 
major birth defects
